code: import"slick-carousel/slick/slick.css";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css";import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Slider from"react-slick";import Card from"./card";import tarot1 from'../img/tarot1.png';import tarot2 from'../img/tarot2.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Carousel2(){var settings={dots:false,infinite:true,speed:500,slidesToShow:3,slidesToScroll:1,initialSlide:0,responsive:[{breakpoint:1134,settings:{slidesToShow:2,slidesToScroll:1,infinite:true,dots:true}},{breakpoint:750,settings:{slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1,initialSlide:2}}]};const navigate=useNavigate();const handleCardClick=(title,price,backgroundImage)=>{navigate("/details",{state:{title,price,backgroundImage}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slider-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Slider,{...settings,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{backgroundImage:tarot1,title:"Lectura B\xE1sica",price:"$1500",color:'#A88E77',onClick:()=>handleCardClick("Lectura Basica","$1500",tarot1)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{backgroundImage:tarot2,title:"Lectura Avanzada",price:"$2500",color:'#A88E77',onClick:()=>handleCardClick("Lectura Avanzada","$2500",tarot2)})})]})});}export default Carousel2;
